mapper.select: SELECT package_no, name, hall, studio, dress, makeup FROM package ORDER BY package_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO package (package_no, name, hall, studio, dress, makeup) VALUES (seq_package_no.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{hallId}, #{studioId}, #{dressId}, #{makeupId})
mapper.update: UPDATE package SET name = #{name}, hall = #{hallId}, studio = #{studioId}, dress = #{dressId}, makeup = #{makeupId} WHERE package_no = #{id}
